    • Uses of RequestBuilder in org.apache.streams.sysomos.provider

      Classes in org.apache.streams.sysomos.provider that implement RequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRequestBuilder
      Defines a common pattern for requesting data from the Sysomos API.
      class  ContentRequestBuilder
      Builds requests for the Sysomos Heartbeat Content API.

      RequestBuilder ContentRequestBuilder.setAddedAfterDate(org.joda.time.DateTime afterDate)

      Sets the date after which documents should be returned from Sysomos.

      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setAddedBeforeDate(org.joda.time.DateTime beforeDate)
      Sets the date before which documents should be returned from Sysomos.

      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setHeartBeatId(int hid)
      Sets the Sysomos Heartbeat ID.
      RequestBuilder ContentRequestBuilder.setHeartBeatId(String hid) 
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setHeartBeatId(String hid)
      Sets the Sysomos Heartbeat ID as a String.
      RequestBuilder ContentRequestBuilder.setOffset(long offset) 
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setOffset(long offset)
      Sets the starting offset for the number of documents given the other parameters.
      RequestBuilder ContentRequestBuilder.setReturnSetSize(long size) 
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setReturnSetSize(long size)
      Sets the size of the expected response.
